E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 3/1/1987
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B John Tamplin
in return for
SP Dean Hirt, SP David Fuentez, RF Gerard Longshore.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Boston (FBA) GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of Mickey Hart
Dear Sir,
Mickey Hart has nothing more to prove at A Hana Rainbows!
He has an AVG of .340 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Santo Miller
Dear Sir,
Santo Miller has an AVG of .229 at AA Maui Whalers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of Russell Borkowski
Dear Sir,
Russell Borkowski is hitting the ball well at A Hana Rainbows!
He has an AVG of .356, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Curtis Seemann
Dear Sir,
Curtis Seemann isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .146, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Sunday, 5/4/1987
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Jose Arroyo

Date: Saturday, 5/10/1987
Subject: Status of Angelo Campos
Dear Sir,
Angelo Campos shouldn't play at AA Maui Whalers!

be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/16/1987
Subject: Aldo Guerrero healing process
Aldo Guerrero is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Regards,
Eric Mcvey

in my last year of the contract.

Regards,
Celso Sabatino
